title: Offer Evaluation - PSU Job vs MNC. The Confusion Story.
content:
**Education**: BTech CSE 2024 Grad (IIT/NIT/IIIT)
**Years of Experience**: 0
**Prior Experience**: SDE Intern at a Startup

***Fortunately, by God's grace I have received the following offers and now I am totally confused. Please help me decide. I understand both of them comes with there own pros. But I am totally new to corporate and not sure if it is really worth the investment of your energy to be in it and run for money. Or rather pick a govt. job with obviously a lower pay but have mental peace with good facilites + medical benefits.***

**Offer 1 [Intern + Potential PPO]**
**Company**: Big MNC
**Title/Level**: SDE Intern with potential of a PPO (20LPA+ = ~1.2-1.5 L per month in hand after conversion)
**Salary**: 75K / month as Intern
**Location**: Bangalore
**Other Details**: Heard conversion is high, but obviously it's totally risky. Though the full time offer is worth the risk.

**Offer 2** 
**Company**: Maharatna PSU
**Title/Level**: MT 
**Salary**: ~19.5 LPA CTC (~85K/month in hand)
**Location**: Pune/Mumbai
**Perks**: Chill Life, Medical Facilities, HRA, DA and other government stuff.

Please help me decide guys. I would love to hear from you guys and know your experiences!
